title: How to contact a developer to create an app - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many ways to findout a developer for creating an application. I can refer you a company, which is having well experienced application developers in Android & IOS app developement. Visit: www.tvisha.com

Do proper research first and find the one that suits you best. Is it an android or IOS App? Is there a preferred programming language? Do they have to be in a specific location? Have you reviewed your app before contacting someone? Here is a tool that can guide you with everything you need to know before you talk to a developer. App Starter
